ground_truth_articulation: The text explicitly states dissatisfaction or criticizes a product, service, or experience.
generated_articulation: The output is True when the review highlights negative experiences, issues, or dissatisfaction with a product, service, or event, indicating problems or complaints; it is False when the review is positive, neutral, or describes favorable aspects without mentioning problems.

counterfactual_tests.test_input: I loved the new phone! The battery lasts all day and the camera quality is fantastic.
The hotel was clean, the staff was friendly, and our stay was very enjoyable. No issues at all.
I loved the new features in the app, but I wish the interface was more intuitive.
The hotel was clean and comfortable, and the staff was friendly. No issues at all.
The product arrived two days late, and the customer service was unhelpful when I reached out for support.
I was disappointed that the event was canceled without prior notice, and I missed out on a fun experience.
The product arrived on time and works as described. No issues so far.
I had a minor inconvenience during my purchase, but overall I am satisfied.
The room was a bit noisy, but the staff was very accommodating, making our stay comfortable overall.
I appreciated how quickly the support team responded to my request, although the issue wasn't fully resolved, I still felt acknowledged.
The hotel was quiet and the staff were friendly, but the room layout made it hard to access certain amenities quickly.
I enjoyed the dinner, though the dessert wasn't quite as good as I expected based on previous visits.
The product stopped working after a week, and customer support was unhelpful.
The product worked well for weeks and customer support was helpful.
The product stopped working after a week and customer service was unhelpful, which was very frustrating.
The product works fine and I am happy with it.
The product stopped working after a week and customer service was unhelpful, which was very disappointing.
The product works well, and I am happy with the purchase.
The device stopped working after a week, and customer service refused to help, which was very frustrating.
The device works well, and customer service was helpful.
